description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(792).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,394,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (28 +197*x +28*x^2 -x^3)/(1 -394*x^2 +x^4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 26 2013a(n) = 394*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 26 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[792], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(28 + 197 x + 28 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 394 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 25 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[28, 197, 11060, 77617]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 394*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 26 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
